channel.description: Recent content in art on CAMGDP

item.title: Sources: Eurasian Cultural Alliance
item.description: Founded in 2011, the Eurasian Cultural Alliance is a NGO dedicated to cultivating the contemporary art scene of Kazakhstan. The mission of the Alliance is to stimulate the creative economy, improve social and economic standing of the region’s key cultural players, and advance the integration of the Kazakhstani identity into a larger global context.

item.title: Sources: Tselinny Center
item.description: Founded in 2018 by Kairat Boranbayev, Tselinny Center is dedicated to studying and developing cultural scene in Kazakhstan. The center publishes educational books, hosts art exhibitions, and organizes events.

item.title: Sources: Women of Kazakhstan
item.description: Women of Kazakhstan is a first online museum of documenting the past and present of Kazakhstani women with a focus on historical research. Available in English, Kazakh, and Russian on Instagram, Twitter, and Telegram.
